name: ★FROG SMASHERS★
description:
FROG SMASHERS tells the tale of a simple misunderstanding at a bus stop leading to the downfall of all frogkind.

A local multiplayer brawler game about hitting frogs with baseball bats.

Influences include Samurai Gunn, Lethal League and the Smash series.

Controls

Gamepads (PS4 / XBox) plugged into the PC / Mac are HIGHLY recommended but you can use the keyboard as well. TIP: Hold down the [attack] button for a super-charged strike. Also, press [direction] and [attack] together to send a frog flying in the direction of your choice.

Player 1

movement: WASD

actions: T,Y,U

Player 2

movement: ← → ↑ ↓

actions: M , .

Have fun!

Programming/Design: Ruan Rothmann

Art/Animation: Mike Scott

Additional Art: Ben Rausch & Stuart Coutts

Sound: Jason Sutherland
